channel.title: Help - Make Something ("P.")
channel.description:
[center][size=13pt]Welcome[/size]
[i]I'm currently looking for some help. I need help to load something from another player. It's simple for some people but i find this very hard. I know that you can make something ("p.") but i don't understand it. If i give someone an example here and you can post back how i would do it, i'm sure i can work my way from that.[/i]
[code]p.sendMessage("Test.");[/code]
[i]What would be the void for, p.sendMessage? Where would i add it?[/i][/center]

item.title: Help - Make Something ("P.")
item.dc:creator: @intPkx intPkx
item.description:
@intPkx wrote:

[center][size=13pt]Welcome[/size]

I’m currently looking for some help. I need help to load something from another player. It’s simple for some people but i find this very hard. I know that you can make something (“p.”) but i don’t understand it. If i give someone an example here and you can post back how i would do it, i’m sure i can work my way from that.

p.sendMessage("Test.");

What would be the void for, p.sendMessage?
Where would i add it?[/center]

Read full topic
